attributes.review: I downloaded this app because I thought it would be a fun pastime during quarantine because the Government didn’t do a good job of preparing for Corona, and many ✨dumb dumb✨ Americans refuse to wear masks, so it is unsafe to go outside still even though other countries who handled the virus well are opening up again. Little did I know this app supports horrifying behavior such as racism, white supremacy, homophobia, sexism and xenophobia, not to mention r*ping and ped0philia. Absolutely DISGUSTING and REVOLTING. I am shocked that this app is even allowed on the App Store, and I think it should be removed ASAP. this app is DANGEROUS and promotes hatred. I’m disappointed but not surprised
attributes.title: WORST APP EVER

attributes.review: The second i downloaded this app my phone shut off for a whole month, once it finally turned back on my phone was rearranged and all my contacts and pictures were missing. I kept getting calls from the Trump administration telling me if i didn’t vote for him i’d be sentenced life in prison, IM 14!!!! I decided to delete the app and everything went back to normal, my pictures restored, my contacts restored, the calls stopped, and my phone was the same it was before. I don’t recommend this app at all, it has a tendency to yell racial slurs at you when ever you aren’t on it.
attributes.title: ABSOLUTELY HORRIBLE

attributes.review: The fitness gram pacer test is a multistage aerobic capacity test that progressively gets more difficult as it continues. The 20 meter pacer test will begin in 30 seconds. Line up at the start. The running speed starts slowly but gets faster each minute after you hear this signal beepboop . A sing lap should be completed every time you hear this sound. ding Remember to run in a straight line and run as long as possible. The second time you fail to complete a lap before the sound, your test is over. The test will begin on the word start. On your mark. Get ready!… Start.
attributes.title: The fitness gram pacer test

attributes.review: OKAY IM FIRED UP. I DOWNLOADED THIS APP TO TRUMP FEET PICS . But you what I did see MIKE PENCES FEET PICS. I wanted to see lil trumpys feet pics not mike PENCES feet pics 😡😡😡😡🥵😡. Oh yeah that’s not even the worse part . When I closed the app my background picture WAS PAPA JOHN. But the worse part is when I was going to change my background ALL MY PICTURES ON MY PHONE WERE JUST PAPA JOHNs DIRTY RAT FACE. But the even worse part is LIL HUDDY WAS AT MY DOOR. I immediately call the police because I was scared for my life then cops came and knock down my door and arrested lil huddy but when lil was at my house he took my fridge so I don’t have a fridge anymore so please donate to my only fans to get me a new fridge
attributes.title: Awful just awful

attributes.review: i was a girl in the village doin alright then i became a princes overnight now i gotta figure out how to do it right so much to learn and see up in the castle with my new family in a school that’s just for royalty a whole enchanted world is waiting for me. i’m so excited to be sophia the first i’m finding out what being royals all about sophia the first making my way it’s a new adventure everyday sophia it’s gonna be my time to show them all that i’m sophia the first. i hand typed this okay thanks. This app gave me corona through the 5Ghz it radiates into my palms and blood stream and now my kids have the virus too.
attributes.title: maybe....no. ❤️

attributes.review: My first mistake was downloading this app. As soon as I did, it asked to access my camera and microphone. I clicked ok ✨of course✨ and then a video of the annoying orange starts playing for a run time of 48 hours! I couldn’t exit the app at ALL no matter how many times I pressed the home button. I tried turning off my phone and it wouldn’t turn off. So my phone was stuck playing the annoying 🍊 and I had to leave it on the entire. time. Do not recommend at all and now I can’t eat nor LOOK at another orange ever again without experiencing the trauma.
attributes.title: I loathe the annoying orange

attributes.review: This app singlehandedly put some of the worst events of my life into motion. Once I downloaded it I immediately felt a weird feeling. Well this feeling was actually real because I had explosive diarrhea then I slipped in it and cracked my head open. Upon arriving at the hospital they told me I suffered extreme injuries and would need extensive surgery. When I was laying in my hospital bed a psychopath stormed in the room and stabbed me seven times in the stomach. This evidently killed me. I am now inhabiting a random body in order to spread the message to never download this app or face the life altering, emotional, horrific consequences that will await you.
attributes.title: Utterly Trumpitized

attributes.review: My 14 year old son Jack downloaded this app a few months back and he started noticing it gave him a weird virus. As he started getting really into the Trump 2020 campaign, and using the app he would mention that his phone would heat up a lot while on the app and eventually on May 3rd, his phone EXPLODED in his hands resulting and shrapnel flew into his eyes. He is now legally blind in one eye and has lost his arm. My son is now a never trumper, and has nightmares even seeing a trump sign because it reminds him of this app. But i still believe in the one day true president of the world donald trump. Long may he reign, lord bless his soul.
attributes.title: Shocked

attributes.review: First of all it glitches out every time I try to use it, saying you can only use English and if you try to change it tells you “you’re in America speak english” and threatens deportation when I was literally born here. After those horrible messages, I didn’t even bother trying to open the app ever again. Horrible app, just as bad as the president himself. Wish I could give it zero stars. Better yet, I wish this app was permanently removed from the app store because this kind of bottom feeder level shouldn’t even exist in the first place.
attributes.title: Doesn’t even deserve 1 star

attributes.review: i downloaded this💟 app to see my favorite oompa loompa but🤎 when i got it i opened ❤️it to see my moms😛 cousins boyfriends are uncles🍌 dogs chinchillas babysitters fathers😺 sister . I say there in scilence o and closed the app to find my wallpaper had been changed 😊to a picture of lil huddy . he started saying the n word because he is a black icon . then 😑martha my very average😹 dog went ruff and then one day was bizarre and i woke up ✨to dixie charlis sister ) singing BHUESJYES sometimes i don't wanna😏 be happy don't lll hold it against me and then harry😏 styles murdered my whole family 1 star and i give it one star because i got to meet harry🤢
attributes.title: ANYONE BUT HIM 2020
